name: Mio Technologies, Inc.
description: Mio Technologies, Inc. is an innovative company at the forefront of digital water management solutions aimed at optimizing the usage and distribution of water resources. Founded in 2015, Mio Technologies leverages advanced data analytics, IoT devices, and AI technology to provide real-time insights and actionable solutions for both urban and agricultural water systems. The company’s flagship product, the Mio Sensor, is a smart device that monitors water flow and quality, allowing municipalities and agricultural businesses to manage their water resources more efficiently. Mio Technologies aims to address global water scarcity issues by promoting sustainable water practices and enhancing the resilience of water systems against climate change. In addition to its hardware, the company offers a cloud-based platform for data visualization and analysis, enabling users to make informed decisions regarding water usage and conservation. With a commitment to innovation and sustainability, Mio Technologies is dedicated to transforming how water resources are managed and utilized across various sectors.
